===Alternative forms===
* {{l|mul|户}} – note the different stroke order: [[户]] has 丿 as last (fourth) stroke, while 戶 (this page) has 丿 as second stroke
* {{l|mul|戸}}
Also beware to distinguish different forms of this character – {{lang|ja|戶}} (top stroke connects to left stroke) vs. {{lang|und|sc=Hani|戶}} (top stroke does not connect).
